titles.title: You alone have done great things

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My soul proclaims Your greatness, Lord
Rejoicing in my Saviour
Your mercy belongs to those who fear Your Son
His blessings You have given them forever

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And holy is His name,
holy is His name

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You alone have done great things
I can't boast of anything
Mighty one, and King of kings, Jesus

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You alone have done great things
By Your living word in me
Mighty One, and King of kings, Jesus

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
My soul proclaims Your greatness, Lord
Rejoicing in my Saviour
Your mercy belongs to those who fear Your Son
His blessings You have given them forever

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
And holy is His name,
holy is His name

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
You alone have done great things
I can't boast of anything
Mighty one, and King of kings, Jesus

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
You alone have done great things
By Your living word in me
Mighty One, and King of kings, Jesus

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
It's Your name we're shouting out
Shouting out loud
